messages.content: डावनि दिसत आहे काय फवारणी करावी
messages.en: The left sees what to spray
messages.standalone_question: Is there any spray that should be applied if the leaves are turning yellow?
messages.standalone_en: Is there any spray that should be applied if the leaves are turning yellow?
messages.content_transliterated: davani disat aahe kay favarani karavi

messages.content:
आपल्या प्लॉटसाठी फवारणीची आवश्यकता नाही. 

**Plot No 1 SSN** मध्ये काही कीटकांची कमी जोखलेली आहे, परंतु त्यांचा धोका कमी आहे:
- **फ्ली बीटल**: 30% (कमी धोका)
- **मीलीबग**: 32.1% (कमी धोका)
- **जॅसिड्स**: 42.2% (कमी धोका)
- **कॅटरपिलर**: 40.5% (कमी धोका)

इतर प्लॉटसाठी कीटक मेट्रिक्स उपलब्ध नाहीत. 

आपण फवारणी करण्याचा विचार करत असाल, तर थोडा वेळ थांबा आणि पुन्हा तपासा.
messages.en:
No spraying is required for your plot. 

**Plot No. 1 SSN** has a low risk of some insects, but their risk is low:
- **Flea Beetle**: 30% (low risk)
- **Millibug**: 32.1% (low risk)
- **Jassids**: 42.2% (low risk)
- **Caterpillar**: 40.5% (low risk)

Insect metrics are not available for other plots. 

If you're thinking of spraying, wait a minute and check again.

messages.content: डावनि मिल्ड्यू चि बुरशी पानावर दिसत आहे ति जळून जान्या करिता काय फवारणी करावी
messages.en: What spray to spray to burn the left mildew fungus is visible on the leaf
messages.standalone_question: What treatment should be applied to address the mildew fungus appearing on the leaves?
messages.standalone_en: What treatment should be applied to address the mildew fungus appearing on the leaves?
messages.content_transliterated: davani mildue chi burshi panavar disat aahe ti jalun janya karita kay favarani karavi

messages.content:
डावनि मिल्ड्यू च्या बुरशीसाठी खालील फवारणी वापरावी:

1. **फंगिसाइड**: 
   - **मेटालॅक्सिल**: 0.2% (2 ग्रॅम प्रति लिटर पाण्यात)
   - **कॅरबेंडाझिम**: 0.1% (1 ग्रॅम प्रति लिटर पाण्यात)

फवारणी करताना, पाण्याच्या प्रमाणात योग्य प्रमाणात फंगिसाइड मिसळा आणि पानांच्या दोन्ही बाजूंवर चांगल्या प्रकारे फवारणी करा. 

आपण फवारणी करण्यापूर्वी हवामानाची स्थिती तपासा, कारण पाऊस किंवा उच्च आर्द्रता फवारणीच्या प्रभावावर परिणाम करू शकते.
messages.en:
The following sprays should be used for the fungus Dauni mildew:

1. **Fungicide**: 
   * Metalaxil**: 0.2% (2 grams per liter of water)
   * Carabendazim**: 0.1% (1 g/l in water)

When spraying, mix the right amount of fungicide with the amount of water and spray well on both sides of the leaves. 

Check weather conditions before you spray, as rain or high humidity can affect the effect of spraying.

messages.content: भुरी साठी काय फवारणी द्यावे
messages.en: What to spray for brown
messages.standalone_question: What kind of spray should be used for bhuri?
messages.standalone_en: What kind of spray should be used for bhuri?

messages.content: आपल्या प्लॉटसाठी भुरीसाठी कोणतीही फवारणीची शेड्यूल नाही. जर तुम्हाला भुरीसाठी फवारणी करायची असेल, तर कृपया स्थानिक कृषी तज्ञांचा सल्ला घ्या.
messages.en: There is no spraying schedule for brown for your plot. If you want to spray for brown, please consult a local agricultural expert.

messages.content: करपा व डाऊन साठी काय फवारणी द्यावे
messages.en: What to spray for karpa and down
messages.standalone_question: What kind of spray should be used for karpa and down?
messages.standalone_en: What kind of spray should be used for karpa and down?
messages.content_transliterated: karpa v down sathi kay favarani dyave

messages.content: आपल्या प्लॉटसाठी करपा आणि डाऊनसाठी कोणतीही फवारणीची शेड्यूल उपलब्ध नाही. तसेच, पेस्ट मेट्रिक्ससाठी देखील माहिती उपलब्ध नाही. कृपया स्थानिक कृषी तज्ञांचा सल्ला घ्या.
messages.en: There is no spraying schedule available for karpa and down for your plot. Also, information is not available for paste metrics. Please consult a local agricultural expert.

messages.content: Coton स्लरी कशी बनवता
messages.en: How to Make Cotton Slurry
messages.standalone_question: How do you make cotton slurry?
messages.standalone_en: How do you make cotton slurry?

messages.content:
कॉटन स्लरी बनवण्यासाठी खालील पद्धत वापरा:

1. **साहित्य**:
   - कापसाचे बियाणे
   - पाणी
   - एक मोठा भांडे किंवा पातेलं

2. **पद्धत**:
   - कापसाचे बियाणे चांगले निवडा आणि त्यांना स्वच्छ पाण्यात 24 तास भिजवून ठेवा.
   - नंतर, भिजलेले बियाणे एका मिक्सरमध्ये ठेवा.
   - त्यात आवश्यकतेनुसार पाणी घाला, जेणेकरून एक गुळगुळीत पेस्ट तयार होईल.
   - या पेस्टला चांगले मिक्स करा, जेणेकरून सर्व बियाणे चांगले एकत्रित होईल.
   - तयार झालेली स्लरी वापरण्यासाठी तयार आहे.

3. **वापर**:
   - या स्लरीचा वापर पिकांच्या पाण्याच्या व्यवस्थापनासाठी किंवा खत म्हणून केला जाऊ शकतो.

स्लरी तयार करताना स्वच्छता आणि योग्य प्रमाणात पाण्याचा वापर करणे महत्त्वाचे आहे.
messages.en:
Use the following method to make cotton slurry:

1. **Literature**:
   - Cotton seeds
   -water
   - A large pot or pot

2. **Method**:
   Choose cotton seeds well and soak them in clean water for 24 hours.
   Then, place the soaked seeds in a mixer.
   Add water as needed, so as to form a smooth paste.
   Mix this paste well, so that all the seeds are well combined.
   - The finished slurry is ready to use.

3. **Use***
   - This slurry can be used for crop water management or as fertilizer.

It is important to clean up and use the right amount of water when preparing the slurry.

messages.content: पेरू साठी कोणती स्लरी फायदेशीर असते
messages.en: Which slurry is beneficial for Peru
messages.standalone_question: Which slurry is beneficial for guava?
messages.standalone_en: Which slurry is beneficial for guava?
messages.content_transliterated: peru sathi konati slurry phayadeshir asate

messages.content:
पेरू (ग्वावा) साठी खालील स्लरी फायदेशीर असते:

1. **कॉटन स्लरी**: कापसाचे बियाणे वापरून तयार केलेली स्लरी, जी पेरूच्या पिकांसाठी पोषण प्रदान करते.

2. **फळांच्या पानांची स्लरी**: पेरूच्या पानांचा वापर करून तयार केलेली स्लरी, जी पिकांच्या आरोग्यासाठी उपयुक्त असते.

3. **गायाच्या गोबराची स्लरी**: गोबर आणि पाण्याचे मिश्रण, जे नैसर्गिक खत म्हणून कार्य करते.

4. **कांद्याची स्लरी**: कांद्याच्या पानांचा वापर करून तयार केलेली स्लरी, जी रोगप्रतिबंधक गुणधर्मांसाठी उपयुक्त आहे.

या स्लरींचा वापर पेरूच्या पिकांच्या वाढीसाठी आणि आरोग्यासाठी फायदेशीर ठरतो. योग्य प्रमाणात आणि वेळेत वापर केल्यास अधिक चांगले परिणाम मिळू शकतात.
messages.en:
The following slurry is beneficial for Peru (Guava):

1. **Cotton slurry**: A slurry made using cotton seeds, which provides nutrition for guava crops.

2. **Fruit leaf slurry**: A slurry made using guava leaves, which is useful for the health of crops.

3. **Cow dung slurry**: A mixture of cow dung and water, which acts as a natural fertilizer.

4. **Onion slurry**: A slurry made using onion leaves, which is useful for immune properties.

The use of these slurries is beneficial for the growth and health of peruvian crops. Better results can be achieved if used in the right amount and time.

messages.content: What is soil moisture value
messages.en: What is soil moisture value
messages.standalone_question: What is the value of soil moisture?
messages.standalone_en: What is the value of soil moisture?

tools:
get_daily_soil_moisture_data  
Retrieves historical daily soil moisture data from soil moisture sensors, in kPa or percentage. Provides soilMoisture1 and soilMoisture2 fields only. Suitable for larger duration.

get_optimal_soil_moistures  
Retrieves the optimal soil moisture values in kPa or percentage above which to irrigate for all plots. 0 kPa means wet, 200 kPa means dry soil. In percentage: 0% means dry, 100% means wet. In percentage values, irrigate when below the optimum range.

get_hourly_soil_moisture_data  
Retrieves historical hourly soil moisture data from soil moisture sensors, in kPa or percentage. Provides soilMoisture1 and soilMoisture2 fields only. Suitable for less than 5 days duration.

get_soil_moisture_percentage_from_kpa_reading  
Gets the estimated soil moisture percentage for a given plot and kPa reading.

get_soil_moisture_sensor_depth  
Returns the depths in inches of the soil moisture sensors 1 and 2 installed on the plots.
faq:
Q: What is my soil moisture depletion?
A: Soil moisture depletion %age = (100 - soil moisture %age)

Q: How do I know if my soil  moisture sensor is working fine ?
A: The only way to know is if after irrigation the sensor is dropping below 5 kpa and increasing continuously unless next irrigation is done. You can try putting water on the sensor and it should drop. Also, there should not be any fluctuations in the soil moisture data and the pressure kpa should always be increasing. Also, a soil moisture reading of 0 kPa is perfectly fine, meaning wet soil, but a reading of 200 kPa could mean fault. If the soil moisture sensor reading is consistently at 0 from few 48 hours, then it could be anamolous (use live and historical hourly soil moisture data (use tool) to validate).

Q: Sensor is showing wet, i.e. less kpa but soil looks dry.
A: The sensor measures the moisture around the rootzone which is not visible from the top. Ask use to check the moisture in rootzone around the sensor. If it matches, ask the user to irrigate.

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor always shows wet values?
A: Verify the irrigation frequency, check the installation point, and contact Fyllo representative if the issue persists.

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor values fluctuate?
A: Ensure the sensor is installed properly in the soil, check for air bubbles, and contact Fyllo representative if the issue persists.

messages.content:
The soil moisture values for your plot "maze" are as follows:
- Soil Moisture Sensor 1: 23%
- Soil Moisture Sensor 2: 86%

This indicates that the soil is relatively wet, especially at Sensor 2.
messages.en:

- Soil Moisture Sensor 1: 23%
- Soil Moisture Sensor 2: 86%

This indicates that the soil is relatively wet, especially at Sensor 2.

messages.content: મગફળીમાં શું ફાટીગેશન આપવું હવે
messages.en: What to give in peanuts now
messages.standalone_question: What kind of fertilization should be given to peanuts now?
messages.standalone_en: What kind of fertilization should be given to peanuts now?

messages.content:
મગફળીના પાકમાં હાલમાં ફર્ટિગેશનની જરૂર નથી. તમે હવે "સોઇંગ" તબક્કામાં છો, જે 2025-06-06 થી શરૂ થયો છે.

આગામી તબક્કો "વેજેટેટિવ" છે, જે 2025-07-19 થી શરૂ થશે. આ તબક્કામાં, ફોલિયર પદ્ધતિ દ્વારા ફર્ટિગેશનની જરૂર પડશે. 

**ફોલિયર પદ્ધતિ માટેની સૂચનાઓ:**
- ઝિંક સલ્ફેટ: 600 ગ્રામ/એકર
- ફેરસ સલ્ફેટ: 600 ગ્રામ/એકર
- મેગ્નેશિયમ સલ્ફેટ: 1.2 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

ફોલિયર સ્પ્રે માટેનું મિશ્રણ 1% થી વધુ ન હોવું જોઈએ, જેમ કે 5 કિલોગ્રામ 500 લિટર પાણીમાં.
messages.en:
The groundnut crop does not currently require fertigation. You are now in the "swing" phase, which started from 2025-06-06.

The next phase is "Vegative", which will start from 2025-07-19. In this phase, fertigation will be required by the Foliar method. 

**Instructions for foliar method:**
- Zinc sulfate: 600 g/acre
Ferrous sulfate: 600 g/acre
Magnesium sulfate: 1.2 kg/acre

The mixture for foliar spray should not be more than 1%, such as in 5 kg 500 liters of water.
